pullrequest.title: Proposal: Updating to Visual Studio 2017 and improving Windows CI

content.raw: I would recommend that we get the necessary approvals for all of the Windows update related branches and then merge them all at the same time. Otherwise, if we merge the `release-tools` before the dependent ignition projects (cmake, math, common), it will break the existing `ign-cmake`, `ign-math`, and `ign-common` testing on Windows. Note that the Windows CI for ignition projects other than those three should be unaffected.
